languages.text: Трибуна почти не повреждена — вероятно, ее яростно защищали. Рядом лежит тело проповедника — отсюда он читал последнюю молитву.
The pulpit is almost intact — it was no doubt fiercely defended. Nearby lies the body of the preacher — it was from here that he recited his last prayer.
languages.original_text: Трибуна почти не повреждена — вероятно, ее яростно защищали. Рядом лежит тело проповедника — отсюда он читал последнюю молитву.

traits.locale_text: The pulpit is almost intact — it was no doubt fiercely defended. Nearby lies the body of the preacher — it was from here that he recited his last prayer.
The pulpit is almost intact — it was no doubt fiercely defended. Nearby lies the body of the preacher — it was from here that he recited his last prayer.
The pulpit is almost intact — it was no doubt fiercely defended. Nearby lies the body of the preacher — it was from here that he recited his last prayer.

languages.text: El púlpito está casi intacto; no hay duda de que se defendió con fervor. Cerca de él yace el cuerpo del predicador: aquí fue donde entonó su última oración.
languages.original_text: The pulpit is almost intact — it was no doubt fiercely defended. Nearby lies the body of the preacher — it was from here that he recited his last prayer.

traits.locale_text: El púlpito está casi intacto; no hay duda de que se defendió con fervor. Cerca de él yace el cuerpo del predicador: aquí fue donde entonó su última oración.

languages.text: 这座圣坛几乎完好无损。毫无疑问，那些守卫曾竭尽全力守护这座圣坛。布道士的尸体就躺在附近，他应该就是在这里进行了最后的祷告。
languages.original_text: The pulpit is almost intact — it was no doubt fiercely defended. Nearby lies the body of the preacher — it was from here that he recited his last prayer.

traits.locale_text: 这座圣坛几乎完好无损。毫无疑问，那些守卫曾竭尽全力守护这座圣坛。布道士的尸体就躺在附近，他应该就是在这里进行了最后的祷告。

languages.text: 説教壇はほぼ無傷だ… 固く守られていたに違いない。近くにはプリーチャーの死体が横たわっている… 彼が最後の祈りを捧げた場所はここなのだ。
languages.original_text: The pulpit is almost intact — it was no doubt fiercely defended. Nearby lies the body of the preacher — it was from here that he recited his last prayer.

traits.locale_text: 説教壇はほぼ無傷だ… 固く守られていたに違いない。近くにはプリーチャーの死体が横たわっている… 彼が最後の祈りを捧げた場所はここなのだ。

languages.text: La chaire est presque intacte... Elle a certainement été défendue avec acharnement. Le corps du prêcheur se trouve à proximité. C'est ici qu'il a prononcé sa dernière prière.
languages.original_text: The pulpit is almost intact — it was no doubt fiercely defended. Nearby lies the body of the preacher — it was from here that he recited his last prayer.

traits.locale_text: La chaire est presque intacte... Elle a certainement été défendue avec acharnement. Le corps du prêcheur se trouve à proximité. C'est ici qu'il a prononcé sa dernière prière.

languages.text: Die Kanzel ist nahezu intakt – sie wurde ohne Zweifel intensiv verteidigt. In der Nähe liegt die Leiche des Predigers – hier hat er sein letztes Gebet gesprochen.
languages.original_text: The pulpit is almost intact — it was no doubt fiercely defended. Nearby lies the body of the preacher — it was from here that he recited his last prayer.

traits.locale_text: Die Kanzel ist nahezu intakt – sie wurde ohne Zweifel intensiv verteidigt. In der Nähe liegt die Leiche des Predigers – hier hat er sein letztes Gebet gesprochen.

languages.text: Vaiz kürsüsü hemen hemen sağlam. Canla başla savunulduğu şüphesiz. Yakınlarda vaizin cesedi yatıyor. Son duasını buradan okumuş.
languages.original_text: The pulpit is almost intact — it was no doubt fiercely defended. Nearby lies the body of the preacher — it was from here that he recited his last prayer.
